alert.note: Alert for Chester; Gibson; Hardeman; Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 11:09AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Alcorn, Henderson, southeastern Gibson, eastern Hardeman, McNairy, southern Carroll, western Hardin, Madison and Chester Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1109 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blue Goose to near Pocahontas. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Corinth, Humboldt, Lexington, Henderson, Selmer, Natchez Trace State Park, Chickasaw State Park, Natchez Trace State Forest, Chickasaw State Forest, Big Hill Pond State Park, Fairview, Adamsville, Three Way, Sardis, Silerton, Masseyville, Reagan, Bargerton and Pocahontas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
